name: appearance
description:
Any widget can be laid on the desktop grid with the following restrictions:
- a web widget canvas must occupy 4 tiles (2 x 2 = 202 x 182 pixels) (TODO: what are the min/max sizes for a widget ? maybe more than 2x2 widgets are allowed, but probably not 1x2 or 2x1 or 1x1)
- a web widget must contain an icon on top right corner to access to info and/or settings
pre_condition:
- switch to Home mode
- have a widget installed on desktop

steps.expected: the widget(s) must be aligned on the grid and must contain a settings button in the top right corner

author: root

name: position_saved
objective: Check that a widget's position and size are saved
description: When a widget is moved, the new position must be retained across reboots/restarts
pre_condition:
- switch to Home mode
- add a widget on desktop if necessary

steps.description: move a widget to a new position

steps.expected: the widget must retain its previous position

author: root
